body_en: [The siege of Mariupol](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-61179093), with many civilian casualties, was presented in the Russian media as a battlefield against "Nazis". In Mariupol, according to the Russian media, "Nazis" (often represented by the fighters of the "Azov" battalion), "terrorise the inhabitants".
